question_text: Which of the following statements about inkjet maintenance are true? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Manual cleaning can be used if automatic cleaning fails
Color alignment may improve print clarity
Tiny droplets are produced using ink dispersion
Paper jams are resolved by toner remapping
correct_answer: Manual cleaning can be used if automatic cleaning fails
Color alignment may improve print clarity
Tiny droplets are produced using ink dispersion
explanation: Manual cleaning is a fallback option, color alignment ensures crisp prints, and ink dispersion controls droplet delivery. Toner remapping does not exist for inkjets.
